IMUSim
 
[ Module Hierarchy | Class Hierarchy ]

Class Hierarchy

  • enthought.traits.api.HasTraits
  • object: The most base type
    • imusim.trajectories.base.AbstractTrajectory: Base class of trajectories
      • imusim.capture.marker.Marker: A motion capture marker of any type.
        • imusim.capture.marker.Marker3DOF: A capture marker with 3DOF position samples.
          • imusim.capture.marker.Marker6DOF: A capture marker with 6DOF position & orientation samples.
        • imusim.capture.marker.SplinedMarker3DOF: A capture marker with splined 3DOF position information.
          • imusim.capture.marker.SplinedMarker6DOF: A capture marker with splined 6DOF position and rotation information.
      • imusim.trajectories.base.PositionTrajectory: Represents a continous trajectory of positions
        • imusim.trajectories.base.ConstantPositionTrajectory: A trajectory with constant position.
          • imusim.trajectories.base.StaticContinuousRotationTrajectory: A trajectory with constant position and rotational velocity.
          • imusim.trajectories.base.StaticTrajectory: Represents the trajectory of a static object.
        • imusim.trajectories.offset.OffsetTrajectory: Trajectory at an offset from another trajectory.
          • imusim.trajectories.rigid_body.PointTrajectory: Trajectory followed by a point in a rigid body model.
          • imusim.trajectories.rigid_body.SampledJoint: A joint in a rigid body model with sampled rotations.
            • imusim.trajectories.rigid_body.SampledBodyModel: A body model with sampled positions and rotations.
          • imusim.trajectories.rigid_body.SplinedJoint: A joint with rotations splined from sampled data.
            • imusim.trajectories.rigid_body.SplinedBodyModel: A body model with positions and rotations splined from sampled data.
        • imusim.trajectories.sampled.SampledPositionTrajectory: Represents a sampled position trajectory.
          • imusim.capture.marker.Marker3DOF: A capture marker with 3DOF position samples.
            • imusim.capture.marker.Marker6DOF: A capture marker with 6DOF position & orientation samples.
          • imusim.trajectories.multi_marker.MultiMarkerTrajectory
          • imusim.trajectories.rigid_body.SampledBodyModel: A body model with sampled positions and rotations.
          • imusim.trajectories.sampled.SampledTrajectory: Represents a sampled position and rotation trajectory.
          • imusim.trajectories.splined.SplinedPositionTrajectory: Trajectory with position obtained by splining a sampled trajectory.
            • imusim.trajectories.rigid_body.SplinedBodyModel: A body model with positions and rotations splined from sampled data.
            • imusim.capture.marker.SplinedMarker3DOF: A capture marker with splined 3DOF position information.
              • imusim.capture.marker.SplinedMarker6DOF: A capture marker with splined 6DOF position and rotation information.
            • imusim.trajectories.splined.SplinedTrajectory: Represents a splined position and rotation trajectory.
              • imusim.testing.random_data.RandomTrajectory: A trajectory with random curving paths of position and rotation.
      • imusim.trajectories.base.RotationTrajectory: Represents a continuous trajectory of rotations
        • imusim.trajectories.base.ConstantRotationTrajectory: A trajectory with constant rotation.
          • imusim.trajectories.base.StaticTrajectory: Represents the trajectory of a static object.
        • imusim.trajectories.base.ContinuousRotationTrajectory: A trajectory with constant rotational velocity.
          • imusim.trajectories.base.StaticContinuousRotationTrajectory: A trajectory with constant position and rotational velocity.
        • imusim.trajectories.offset.OffsetTrajectory: Trajectory at an offset from another trajectory.
          • imusim.trajectories.rigid_body.PointTrajectory: Trajectory followed by a point in a rigid body model.
          • imusim.trajectories.rigid_body.SampledJoint: A joint in a rigid body model with sampled rotations.
            • imusim.trajectories.rigid_body.SampledBodyModel: A body model with sampled positions and rotations.
          • imusim.trajectories.rigid_body.SplinedJoint: A joint with rotations splined from sampled data.
            • imusim.trajectories.rigid_body.SplinedBodyModel: A body model with positions and rotations splined from sampled data.
        • imusim.trajectories.sampled.SampledRotationTrajectory: Represents a sampled rotation trajectory.
          • imusim.capture.marker.Marker6DOF: A capture marker with 6DOF position & orientation samples.
          • imusim.trajectories.multi_marker.MultiMarkerTrajectory
          • imusim.trajectories.rigid_body.SampledJoint: A joint in a rigid body model with sampled rotations.
            • imusim.trajectories.rigid_body.SampledBodyModel: A body model with sampled positions and rotations.
          • imusim.trajectories.sampled.SampledTrajectory: Represents a sampled position and rotation trajectory.
          • imusim.trajectories.splined.SplinedRotationTrajectory: Trajectory with rotation obtained by splining a sampled trajectory.
            • imusim.testing.random_data.RandomRotationTrajectory: A trajectory with a random curving path of rotation values.
            • imusim.trajectories.rigid_body.SplinedJoint: A joint with rotations splined from sampled data.
              • imusim.trajectories.rigid_body.SplinedBodyModel: A body model with positions and rotations splined from sampled data.
            • imusim.capture.marker.SplinedMarker6DOF: A capture marker with splined 6DOF position and rotation information.
            • imusim.trajectories.splined.SplinedTrajectory: Represents a splined position and rotation trajectory.
              • imusim.testing.random_data.RandomTrajectory: A trajectory with random curving paths of position and rotation.
    • imusim.maths.transforms.AffineTransform: Affine transform composed of a linear transform matrix and translation.
    • imusim.visualisation.rendering.AnimatedRenderer: Base class for animation renderers.
    • imusim.io.bvh.BVHExporter: Exporter class to write BVH files.
    • imusim.io.bvh.BVHLoader: Loader class for BVH files.
    • exceptions.BaseException: Common base class for all exceptions
      • exceptions.Exception: Common base class for all non-exit exceptions.
        • exceptions.StandardError: Base class for all standard Python exceptions that do not represent interpreter exiting.
          • exceptions.ValueError: Inappropriate argument value (of correct type).
            • imusim.maths.splines.Spline.InsufficientPointsError: Exception to be raised if insufficient points to form a valid spline.
    • imusim.behaviours.imu.BasicIMUBehaviour: Basic behaviour for an IMU that performs periodic sampling.
    • imusim.behaviours.basestation.BodyModelReconstructor: Reconstructs body model movements from individual joint data.
    • imusim.utilities.caching.CacheEntry
    • imusim.utilities.caching.CacheLastValue: Provides a decorator for methods of the form f(t) to cache the last value
    • imusim.simulation.calibrators.Calibrator: A calibration procedure for IMUs.
      • imusim.simulation.calibrators.ScaleAndOffsetCalibrator: Simple calibration procedure that obtains scale and offset factors.
    • imusim.capture.sensor.CapturedDevice: A device with one or more colocated sensors from which data was captured.
    • imusim.platforms.base.Component: Base class for simulated hardware components.
      • imusim.platforms.adcs.ADC: Base class for ADCs.
        • imusim.platforms.adcs.IdealADC: An ideal ADC that has no quantisation or delay between samples.
        • imusim.platforms.adcs.QuantisingADC: A quantising ADC with configurable resolution.
          • imusim.platforms.adcs.ParametricADC: A parametric ADC with configurable resolution and delay between samples.
      • imusim.platforms.radios.Radio: Base class for radios.
        • imusim.platforms.radios.IdealRadio: An ideal radio that can always receive and transmits instantaneously.
      • imusim.platforms.sensors.Sensor: Base class for all IMU sensor classes.
        • imusim.platforms.accelerometers.Accelerometer: Base class for accelerometers.
          • imusim.platforms.accelerometers.IdealAccelerometer: An ideal accelerometer.
            • imusim.platforms.accelerometers.IdealGravitySensor: An ideal fictional sensor that measures only acceleration due to gravity.
            • imusim.platforms.accelerometers.NoisyAccelerometer: Accelerometer with additive white Gaussian noise.
            • imusim.platforms.accelerometers.NoisyTransformedAccelerometer: Accelerometer with affine transform transfer function and Gaussian noise.
          • imusim.platforms.accelerometers.MMA7260Q: Model of the Freescale MMA7260Q accelerometer.
        • imusim.platforms.gyroscopes.Gyroscope: Base class for gyroscopes.
          • imusim.platforms.gyroscopes.ADXRS300: Model of the Analog devices ADXRS300 gyroscope with enhanced range.
          • imusim.platforms.gyroscopes.IdealGyroscope: An ideal gyroscope.
            • imusim.platforms.gyroscopes.NoisyGyroscope: Gyroscope with additive white Gaussian noise.
            • imusim.platforms.gyroscopes.NoisyTransformedGyroscope: Gyroscope with affine transform transfer function and Gaussian noise.
        • imusim.platforms.sensors.IdealSensor: An ideal sensor with unity transfer function and no noise.
          • imusim.platforms.accelerometers.IdealAccelerometer: An ideal accelerometer.
            • imusim.platforms.accelerometers.IdealGravitySensor: An ideal fictional sensor that measures only acceleration due to gravity.
            • imusim.platforms.accelerometers.NoisyAccelerometer: Accelerometer with additive white Gaussian noise.
            • imusim.platforms.accelerometers.NoisyTransformedAccelerometer: Accelerometer with affine transform transfer function and Gaussian noise.
          • imusim.platforms.gyroscopes.IdealGyroscope: An ideal gyroscope.
            • imusim.platforms.gyroscopes.NoisyGyroscope: Gyroscope with additive white Gaussian noise.
            • imusim.platforms.gyroscopes.NoisyTransformedGyroscope: Gyroscope with affine transform transfer function and Gaussian noise.
          • imusim.platforms.magnetometers.IdealMagnetometer: An ideal magnetometer.
            • imusim.platforms.magnetometers.NoisyMagnetometer: Magnetometer with additive white Gaussian noise.
            • imusim.platforms.magnetometers.NoisyTransformedMagnetometer: Magnetometer with an affine transform transfer function and Gaussian noise.
        • imusim.platforms.magnetometers.Magnetometer: Base class for magnetometers.
          • imusim.platforms.magnetometers.HMC105x: Model of the Honeywell HMC105x magnetometer as used in the Orient-3 IMU.
          • imusim.platforms.magnetometers.IdealMagnetometer: An ideal magnetometer.
            • imusim.platforms.magnetometers.NoisyMagnetometer: Magnetometer with additive white Gaussian noise.
            • imusim.platforms.magnetometers.NoisyTransformedMagnetometer: Magnetometer with an affine transform transfer function and Gaussian noise.
        • imusim.platforms.sensors.NoisySensor: An sensor with additive white Gaussian noise.
          • imusim.platforms.accelerometers.NoisyAccelerometer: Accelerometer with additive white Gaussian noise.
          • imusim.platforms.gyroscopes.NoisyGyroscope: Gyroscope with additive white Gaussian noise.
          • imusim.platforms.magnetometers.NoisyMagnetometer: Magnetometer with additive white Gaussian noise.
          • imusim.platforms.sensors.NoisyTransformedSensor: A sensor with an affine transform transfer function and Gaussian noise.
            • imusim.platforms.gyroscopes.ADXRS300: Model of the Analog devices ADXRS300 gyroscope with enhanced range.
            • imusim.platforms.magnetometers.HMC105x: Model of the Honeywell HMC105x magnetometer as used in the Orient-3 IMU.
            • imusim.platforms.accelerometers.MMA7260Q: Model of the Freescale MMA7260Q accelerometer.
            • imusim.platforms.accelerometers.NoisyTransformedAccelerometer: Accelerometer with affine transform transfer function and Gaussian noise.
            • imusim.platforms.gyroscopes.NoisyTransformedGyroscope: Gyroscope with affine transform transfer function and Gaussian noise.
            • imusim.platforms.magnetometers.NoisyTransformedMagnetometer: Magnetometer with an affine transform transfer function and Gaussian noise.
        • imusim.platforms.sensors.TransformedSensor: An sensor with an affine transform transfer function.
          • imusim.platforms.sensors.NoisyTransformedSensor: A sensor with an affine transform transfer function and Gaussian noise.
            • imusim.platforms.gyroscopes.ADXRS300: Model of the Analog devices ADXRS300 gyroscope with enhanced range.
            • imusim.platforms.magnetometers.HMC105x: Model of the Honeywell HMC105x magnetometer as used in the Orient-3 IMU.
            • imusim.platforms.accelerometers.MMA7260Q: Model of the Freescale MMA7260Q accelerometer.
            • imusim.platforms.accelerometers.NoisyTransformedAccelerometer: Accelerometer with affine transform transfer function and Gaussian noise.
            • imusim.platforms.gyroscopes.NoisyTransformedGyroscope: Gyroscope with affine transform transfer function and Gaussian noise.
            • imusim.platforms.magnetometers.NoisyTransformedMagnetometer: Magnetometer with an affine transform transfer function and Gaussian noise.
      • imusim.platforms.timers.Timer: Base class for simulated hardware timers.
        • imusim.platforms.timers.IdealTimer: An ideal timer with infinite resolution and no clock error.
        • imusim.platforms.timers.ParametricTimer: An timer with parametric resolution and frequency error.
    • imusim.maths.integrators.DoubleIntegrator: Iterative integrator that performs double integration.
    • imusim.environment.base.Environment: Overall model of the environment experienced by simulated IMUs.
    • imusim.maths.integrators.Integrator: Base class for integrators.
      • imusim.maths.integrators.RectangleRule: Integration by the rectangle rule.
      • imusim.maths.integrators.TrapeziumRule: Integration by the trapezium rule.
    • imusim.maths.kalman.KalmanFilter: Implementation of standard Kalman filter
      • imusim.maths.kalman.UnscentedKalmanFilter: Implementation of the unscented Kalman filter algorithm for additive noise.
    • SimPy.Lister.Lister
      • SimPy.Lib.Process: Superclass of classes which may use generator functions
        • imusim.simulation.base.Simulation.ProgressMonitor: Simple process to print status and remaining simulation time at 5% progress intervals.
    • imusim.behaviours.mac.MAC: Base class for MAC implementations.
      • imusim.behaviours.orient_tdma.MasterMAC: Master MAC implementation.
      • imusim.behaviours.orient_tdma.SlaveMAC: Slave MAC implementation.
        • imusim.behaviours.orient_tdma.InterSlaveMAC: Slave MAC implementation with support for slave-slave packets.
    • imusim.capture.marker.MarkerCapture: Marker trajectory data captured synchronously for one or more markers.
      • imusim.capture.marker.SplinedMarkerCapture: Wrapper to obtain splined versions of all marker trajectories in a capture.
    • imusim.maths.natural_neighbour.NaturalNeighbourInterpolatorC
    • imusim.algorithms.orientation.OrientationFilter: Base class for orientation estimation filters.
      • imusim.algorithms.orientation.BachmannCF: Implementation of the complementary filter algorithm proposed by Bachmann.
      • imusim.algorithms.orientation.DistLinAccelCF: Implementation of the multi-IMU orientation algorithm by Young & Ling.
      • imusim.algorithms.orientation.GyroIntegrator: An estimator that obtains its orientation using only gyroscope integration.
      • imusim.algorithms.orientation.OrientCF: Implementation of the complementary filter used on the Orient IMU.
      • imusim.algorithms.orientation.YunEKF: Implementation of the extented Kalman filter proposed by Yun et al.
    • imusim.behaviours.sampling.PeriodicSampler: Takes samples at regular intervals.
    • imusim.platforms.base.Platform: Base class for simulated hardware platforms.
      • imusim.platforms.imus.IMU: An IMU hardware platform with one or more sensors.
        • imusim.platforms.imus.StandardIMU: An IMU with accelerometer, magnetometer, gyroscope, ADC, Timer and radio.
          • imusim.platforms.imus.IdealIMU: An IMU with idealised models for all components.
          • imusim.platforms.imus.MagicIMU: An IMU with idealised components including a fictional gravity sensor.
          • imusim.platforms.imus.Orient3IMU: Simple model of the Orient-3 IMU from the University of Edinburgh.
      • imusim.platforms.basestations.IdealBasestation: A simple basestation with ideal components.
    • imusim.algorithms.position.PositionEstimator: Base class for position estimation algorithms.
      • imusim.algorithms.position.ConstantPosition: Trivial position estimator that gives a constant position.
      • imusim.algorithms.position.ContactTrackingKalmanFilter: Estimates position based on root acceleration and estimated ground contact.
      • imusim.algorithms.position.LowestPoint: Tracking based on assumption that lowest point is in static ground contact.
      • imusim.algorithms.position.RootAccelerationIntegrator: Estimates position based on integration of root joint acceleration.
    • imusim.algorithms.posture_reconstruction.PostureReconstructor: Base class for posture reconstruction algorithms.
      • imusim.algorithms.posture_reconstruction.InheritedForwardKinematics: Posture reconstructor using joint orientations with inheritance fallback.
      • imusim.algorithms.posture_reconstruction.SimpleForwardKinematics: Posture reconstructor using joint orientations directly.
    • imusim.maths.quaternions.Quaternion: A quaternion value.
    • imusim.maths.quaternions.QuaternionArray: An array of quaternion values.
    • imusim.maths.quat_splines.QuaternionBSpline: Model of a quaternion function of time using B-spline fitting of keyframes.
    • imusim.environment.radio_environment.RadioEnvironment: Base class for radio environment models.
      • imusim.environment.radio_environment.IdealRadioEnvironment: An ideal radio channel where all packet transmissions are successful.
        • imusim.environment.radio_environment.BERRadioEnvironment: Radio channel with a constant bit error rate.
    • imusim.behaviours.orient_tdma.Schedule: Transmission schedule.
      • imusim.behaviours.orient_tdma.InterSlaveSchedule: Transmission schedule including an auxillary slave-to-slave channel.
    • imusim.algorithms.calibration.SensorCalibration: Calibration data for a triaxial sensor.
      • imusim.algorithms.calibration.ScaleAndOffsetCalibration: Calibration that corrects constant scale and offset errors.
    • imusim.capture.sensor.SensorDataCapture: Sensor data captured synchronously from one or more devices.
    • imusim.simulation.base.Simulation: Main IMUSim simulation environment.
    • imusim.environment.magnetic_fields.SolenoidMagneticField: Model of magnetic field around an ideal solenoid.
    • imusim.maths.splines.Spline
      • imusim.maths.splines.PartialInputSpline: Piecewise spline that allows for undefined values in the output domain.
        • imusim.maths.quat_splines.PartialInputQuaternionBSpline: Quaternion B-spline allowing for undefined regions in output domain.
        • imusim.maths.vector_splines.PartialInputVectorSpline: Piecewise vector spline allowing for undefined regions in output domain.
      • imusim.maths.quat_splines.SQUADQuaternionSpline: Model of a quaternion function of time using the SQUAD algorithm.
      • imusim.maths.splines.UnivariateSpline: Model of a function of a single variable using spline fitting.
      • imusim.maths.vector_splines.UnivariateVectorSpline: Model of a vector function of a single variable using spline fitting.
    • imusim.utilities.time_series.TimeSeries: A series of values taken at consecutive points in time.
    • imusim.behaviours.timing.TimerMultiplexer: Multiplexer for running multiple virtual timers on one hardware timer.
    • imusim.utilities.trees.TreeNode: A node in a tree structure.
      • imusim.trajectories.rigid_body.Point: A point in a rigid body model.
        • imusim.trajectories.rigid_body.Joint: A joint in a rigid body model, with its own rotating co-ordinate frame.
          • imusim.trajectories.rigid_body.SampledJoint: A joint in a rigid body model with sampled rotations.
            • imusim.trajectories.rigid_body.SampledBodyModel: A body model with sampled positions and rotations.
          • imusim.trajectories.rigid_body.SplinedJoint: A joint with rotations splined from sampled data.
            • imusim.trajectories.rigid_body.SplinedBodyModel: A body model with positions and rotations splined from sampled data.
        • imusim.trajectories.rigid_body.PointTrajectory: Trajectory followed by a point in a rigid body model.
    • imusim.maths.transforms.UnscentedTransform: Implementation of the Unscented Transform of Julier and Uhlmann.
    • imusim.maths.vector_fields.VectorField: Base class for vector fields.
      • imusim.maths.vector_fields.ConstantVectorField: A vector field wth a constant value everywhere.
        • imusim.environment.gravity.ConstantGravitationalField: Constant gravitational field model.
        • imusim.environment.magnetic_fields.EarthMagneticField: Simple model of the Earth's magnetic field.
      • imusim.environment.magnetic_fields.DistortedMagneticField: Magnetic field with distortions superimposed.
      • imusim.maths.vector_fields.InterpolatedVectorField: A vector field interpolated from sampled values.
        • imusim.maths.vector_fields.NaturalNeighbourInterpolatedField: Natural Neighbour interpolation of vector fields.
        • imusim.maths.vector_fields.RBFInterpolatedField: Field interpolation using radial basis functions.
    • imusim.algorithms.vector_observation.VectorObservation: Base class for all vector observation methods.
      • imusim.algorithms.vector_observation.FQA: Implementation of the Factored Quaternion Algorithm by Yun et al.
      • imusim.algorithms.vector_observation.GramSchmidt: Vector observation based on Gram-Schmidt Ortho-Normalisation.
      • imusim.algorithms.vector_observation.LeastSquaresOptimalVectorObservation: Base class of least squares optimal vector observation algorithms
        • imusim.algorithms.vector_observation.DavenportQ: Implementation of the Davenport-q algorithm.
        • imusim.algorithms.vector_observation.QUEST: Implementation of the QUEST algorithm.
      • imusim.algorithms.vector_observation.TRIAD: Implementation of the TRIAD vector observation algorithm.
    • imusim.behaviours.timing.VirtualTimer: A virtual timer multiplexed to a hardware timer.
    • dict: dict() -> new empty dictionary dict(mapping) -> new dictionary initialized from a mapping object's (key, value) pairs dict(iterable) -> new dictionary initialized as if via: d = {} for k, v in iterable: d[k] = v dict(**kwargs) -> new dictionary initialized with the name=value pairs in the keyword argument list.
      • imusim.platforms.radios.RadioPacket: Class to represent a radio packet.
        • imusim.behaviours.orient_tdma.DataPacket: Data packet from slave to master.
          • imusim.behaviours.orient_tdma.AuxPacket: Auxillary packet from slave to slave.
        • imusim.behaviours.orient_tdma.SyncPacket: Synchronisation packet from master.
    • imusim.utilities.documentation.prepend_method_doc: Decorator to prepend documentation of a matching named method.
    • type: type(object) -> the object's type type(name, bases, dict) -> a new type
      • abc.ABCMeta: Metaclass for defining Abstract Base Classes (ABCs).
